testcase.name: To verify product details
testcase.system-out: Given User launch the browser and navigates to the shopping app.............passed When User enters valid credentials in the shopping app......................passed And User clicks the SignIn button...........................................passed When User clicks on T-Shirt.................................................passed When User taps on any product...............................................passed Then User validates that image is loaded and displayed......................passed And User validates the product details......................................passed And User validates links for Tweet Share Google+ and Pinterest are displayed.passed And User validates data sheet of the product................................passed And User validates More Info content is displayed...........................passed
